title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a pan, cook the pancetta until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and mix with the grated parmesan.
Combine the pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture, and toss to coat.
Season with black pepper and serve.
